description:
'''Cindy Lee''' is the performance and songwriting project of Canadian musician Patrick Flegel, former guitarist and lead singer of [[Women (band)|Women]].

Cindy Lee is most noted for their 2020 album ''[[What's Tonight to Eternity?]]'', which was longlisted for the [[2020 Polaris Music Prize]], and for 2024's critically acclaimed double album ''[[Diamond Jubilee (album)|Diamond Jubilee]]'', which was shortlisted for the [[2024 Polaris Music Prize]].
